name: STRIKE MANIA
description:
STRIKE MANIA is a game in Breakout style, with various levels, nice graphics, different types of blocks, explosions and many powerups.

A game arcade, casual, for the whole family and TOTALLY FREE!

PS: The game has a significant amount of levels. However if you are interested in the game and want more levels, leave a comment.

If we have a good number of requests I will add new levels. :)
